name: Serene!
description:
What if a game looks relaxing, music feels good BUT each level teases you a lot ?
That is what "Serene!" is all about.

One touch casual game. Tap to turn Left.
Your goal is to collect different color dots with smoothly moving black dot with a purple tail.

Play through 56 handcrafted levels, designed with geometric art, patterns and illusions.

Tip: Simple is more difficult ;)

Features:

• Fluid, graceful one touch gameplay

• 7 Chapters. 56 hand crafted levels

• Original music. Headphones recommended for best experience.

• Game for everyone, smoothly changes from relaxing to challenging mode!

• Supports landscape and portrait mode

• No Timer. No scores

• Home Screen Quick Actions (iPhone 6s and later)

• Taptic Engine support (iPhone 7 and later)

• Languages: English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Chinese(Simplified), Japanese, Korean, Portuguese(Brazil), Malay, Russian
